name: The Crystal Chronicles
description:
The Crystal Chronicles is an A-RPG that is currently in the process of development and slowly expanding with the current funds we are able to provide for the project. Currently it is at Alpha build. Our goal is to create an enjoyable and playable demo that users can experience and hopefully construct it into a full game. 

The Crystal Chronicles project is our take on what we envision for a hopefully exciting Action role playing game. our main focus is to make the gameplay fun and the story interesting and amazing. The prototype demo offers three characters to play (additional information on their combat style is in the manual provided).  We took inspiration on existing franchises and implemented things we thought would result in a fun and unique experience. Give it a try and tell us what you think! We will continue on adding more updates for the game.

Prototype demo features:

  • 3 playable characters to choose from
  • A fast-paced combat system
  • Controller support (Experimental)
  • An open world to explore
  • More to be added soon...

DISCLAIMER: 

The Crystal Chronicles is still under the process of development. The requirements may subject to change. Additionally, the prototype demo is subject to change and does not reflect on the final product.  

There are some notable bugs that are currently being worked on and fixed however, be sure to report any issues if you can. This will help with the development process by a lot.

Additional Information: What is the end goal for this project?

The end goal for the project is to have as many people try out the game prototype and see what can be improved along the development process. 

What can I do to help this project?

Trying out the prototype and giving quality feedback will help Nexus deliver a quality product!
